comments:
I20060628-1135 + ZRH-plugins from 20060704_1144

Create new java project:
- enter name, use default project layout (separate source and output folders)
- press Next
-> on Source tab, project has 2 packages as children: (default package) and src
=> expected: src is a source folder, no default package

When I open the context menu on src and choose 'Use as Source Folder', I get a dialog and this exception:

org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException: The folder is already a source folder.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 149440 ***

traces.message: The folder is already a source folder.
